name: Marcus Smart
comment: Smart (ankle) said Tuesday that he's without a clear timeline to return to game action and acknowledged the possibility that he could remain out through the All-Star break, Jay King of The Athletic reports.

name: Danilo Gallinari
comment: Gallinari (knee) said Sunday in an interview with Gianluca Bortolomai of AroundTheGame.com that his goal remains to return to game action at some point during the Celtics' postseason run.

name: T.J. Warren
comment: Warren (lower leg) could return for Saturday's game against the Wizards, Alex Schiffer of The Athletic reports.

name: Ben Simmons
comment: Jacque Vaughn said on Wednesday that he's hopeful to get Ben Simmons (knee) back vs. the Wizards, Alex Schiffer of The Athletic reports.

name: Kevin Durant
comment: Durant (knee) is on track with his recovery plan and will be re-evaluated again in two weeks, Shams Charania of The Athletic reports.

name: Cody Martin
comment: Martin (knee) is out for Thursday's game versus the Bulls.

name: Kelly Oubre Jr.
comment: Oubre will undergo surgery on a torn ligament in his left hand and will be sidelined for 4-to-6 weeks, Shams Charania of The Athletic reports.

name: Lonzo Ball
comment: Coach Billy Donovan said before Saturday's game against the Magic that Ball (knee) is "nowhere close" to returning and the team will have a formal conversation about a cut-off date if nothing improves by the All-Star break, Julia Poe of the Chicago Tribune reports.

name: Javonte Green
comment: Green (knee) is at least a week away from workouts that include running and jumping, Julia Poe of the Chicago Tribune reports. He remains without a timetable for a return.

name: Dylan Windler
comment: Head coach J.B. Bickerstaff said Monday that Windler (ankle) is making progress and expected to play at some point this season, but the forward remains out indefinitely, Evan Dammarell of FearTheSword.com reports.

name: Christian Wood
comment: Wood (thumb) is out for Thursday's game versus the Pelicans.

name: Maxi Kleber
comment: Kleber said Wednesday that he hopes to return from a torn right hamstring prior to the All-Star break, Tim MacMahon of ESPN.com reports.

name: Jack White
comment: White (adductor) has been ruled out for Thursday's game against the Warriors.

name: Aaron Gordon
comment: Gordon is questionable for Thursday's game against the Warriors due to a left ankle sprain.

name: Collin Gillespie
comment: Gillespie (lower leg) is out Tuesday against the Pelicans.

name: Hamidou Diallo
comment: Diallo (illness) is probable for Wednesday's matchup against the Wizards.

name: Cory Joseph
comment: Joseph (back) has been ruled out for Wednesday's game against the Wizards.

name: Marvin Bagley III
comment: Bagley underwent surgery to repair a fracture of the third and fourth metacarpals in his right hand Thursday and will be re-evaluated in six weeks, NBA writer Marc Stein reports.

name: Cade Cunningham
comment: Cunningham (lower leg) underwent successful surgery Friday to stabilize and promote healing of his left tibial stress fracture, James L. Edwards III of The Athletic reports.

name: Draymond Green
comment: Green is questionable for Thursday's game against the Nuggets due to right foot soreness.

name: Andre Iguodala
comment: Iguodala (hip) won't play in Thursday's game versus the Nuggets.

name: Klay Thompson
comment: Thompson will sit out Thursday at Denver due to right Achilles tendon injury management.

name: Stephen Curry
comment: Curry is questionable for Thursday's game against the Nuggets due to left shoulder soreness.

name: Jabari Smith Jr.
comment: Head coach Stephen Silas remains hopeful Smith (ribs) will suit up Friday against the Raptors, Danielle Lerner of the Houston Chronicle reports.

name: Jalen Green
comment: Coach Stephen Silas said Green (calf) "probably won't play in Friday's game versus the Raptors, Danielle Lerner of the Houston Chronicle reports.

name: Kevin Porter Jr.
comment: Porter (foot/toe) said Tuesday that there's still no timetable for his return to game action, Michael Shapiro of SI.com reports.

name: Tyrese Haliburton
comment: Haliburton is officially questionable for Thursday's matchup against the Lakers, but head coach Rick Carlisle said Wednesday he's planning on the point guard playing, Scott Agness of FieldhouseFiles.com reports.

name: Daniel Theis
comment: Theis (knee) is questionable for Thursday's matchup against the Lakers.

name: John Wall
comment: Head coach Ty Lue relayed Tuesday that Wall (abdomen) remains without a specific target date to retake the floor, Andrew Greif of the Los Angeles Times reports.

name: Austin Reaves
comment: Reaves (hamstring) has been ruled out for Thursday's game against the Pacers, Ryan Ward of LakersNation.com reports.

name: Patrick Beverley
comment: Beverley (knee) is probable for Thursday's game versus the pacers, Ryan Ward of LakersNation.com reports.

name: Anthony Davis
comment: Davis (foot) is probable for Thursday's game against the Pacers, Ryan Ward of LakersNation.com reports.

name: Ziaire Williams
comment: Williams is questionable for Thursday's matchup against the Cavaliers due to right knee soreness.

name: Steven Adams
comment: Adams has been diagnosed with a PCL sprain in his right knee and is expected to miss the next 3-to-5 weeks.

name: Victor Oladipo
comment: Oladipo (ankle) won't play in Thursday's game versus Knicks.

name: Duncan Robinson
comment: Robinson (finger) is listed as out for Thursday's game against the Knicks.

name: Orlando Robinson
comment: Robinson has been ruled out for Thursday's game against the Knicks due to a fractured right thumb.

name: Omer Yurtseven
comment: Yurtseven's left ankle has fully healed from surgery, and he's been cleared for high-impact work, Barry Jackson of the Miami Herald reports.

name: Nikola Jovic
comment: Jovic (back) will miss another four weeks, Ira Winderman of the South Florida Sun Sentinel reports.

name: MarJon Beauchamp
comment: Beauchamp is probable for Thursday's game versus the Clippers with right patella tendinitis.

name: Giannis Antetokounmpo
comment: Antetokounmpo is probable for Thursday's matchup against the Clippers due to right knee soreness.

name: Bobby Portis
comment: Portis (knee) is expected to miss at least two weeks, Adrian Wojnarowski of ESPN reports.

name: Serge Ibaka
comment: Ibaka (personal) and the Bucks mutually agreed Friday to begin pursuing trade opportunities, Shams Charania of The Athletic reports.

name: Jordan McLaughlin
comment: Timberwolves coach Chris Finch said Monday McLaughlin (calf) is "inching" forward in his return process, Jon Krawczynski of The Athletic reports.

name: Karl-Anthony Towns
comment: Timberwolves general manager Tim Connelly relayed Tuesday that Towns (calf) remains sidelined indefinitely, Dane Moore of 'The Dane Moore NBA Podcast' reports.

name: Dyson Daniels
comment: Daniels (ankle) has been ruled out for Thursday's game against the Mavericks, Jim Eichenhofer of the Pelicans' official site reports.

name: Zion Williamson
comment: Williamson (hamstring) will be re-evaluated in two weeks.

name: E.J. Liddell
comment: Liddell (knee) signed a two-way contract with the Pelicans on Sunday.

name: Mitchell Robinson
comment: Knicks team owner James Dolan said Thursday in his appearance on the "Good Day New York" program that Robinson (thumb) will be sidelined for four more weeks, Steve Popper of Newsday reports.

name: Jeremiah Robinson-Earl
comment: The Thunder recalled Robinson-Earl (ankle) to the NBA club from the G League's Oklahoma City Blue, but he's been ruled out for Wednesday's matchup against Houston, Joe Mussatto of The Oklahoman reports.

name: Luguentz Dort
comment: Coach Mark Daigneault said Monday that Dort is "certainly not close" to playing, Rylan Stiles of BricktownBuckets.com reports.

name: Aleksej Pokusevski
comment: Pokusevski sustained a non-displaced tibial plateau fracture in his left leg Tuesday's game against the Thunder and will be re-evaluated in six to eight weeks, Nick Crain of Forbes.com reports.

name: Chet Holmgren
comment: Holmgren (foot) underwent a successful secondary procedure Tuesday to remove hardware from his initial Lisfranc surgery in August, Michael Scotto of USA Today reports.

name: Chuma Okeke
comment: Okeke (knee) has been ruled out for Monday's matchup against the 76ers.

name: Joel Embiid
comment: Embiid is questionable for Friday's game versus San Antonio due to left foot soreness.

name: Devin Booker
comment: Booker (groin) has been ramping up his on-court work and could return to the floor as soon as Tuesday's game against the Nets, source reports.

name: Cameron Payne
comment: Payne (foot) won't play Monday against the Raptors and is out indefinitely, Duane Rankin of The Arizona Republic reports.

name: Landry Shamet
comment: Shamet (foot) won't play Monday against the Raptors and is out indefinitely, Duane Rankin of The Arizona Republic reports.

name: Jae Crowder
comment: Crowder, who has been away from the Suns all season while the team explores avenues to trade him, has been working out daily in Atlanta in order to stay ready for his next opportunity to play, Chris Haynes of BleacherReport.com reports.

name: Jusuf Nurkic
comment: Nurkic, who departed in the first quarter of Wednesday's 122-112 win over the Grizzlies with a sore left calf, was spotted in a walking boot following the game, Casey Holdahl of the Trail Blazers' official site reports.

name: Ibou Badji
comment: Badji (knee) has been ruled out for Monday's game against Atlanta.

name: Justise Winslow
comment: Winslow (ankle) has been ruled out for Saturday's game against the Raptors.

name: Romeo Langford
comment: Langford (adductor) will remain on the sidelines for Wednesday's game, independent NBA writer Matthew Tynan reports.

name: Devin Vassell
comment: Vassell (knee) was spotted Tuesday doing some walking on a treadmill, Tom Osborn of the San Antonio Express-News reports.

name: O.G. Anunoby
comment: Anunoby (wrist) will be held out for the rest of Toronto's road trip, which lasts until Sunday against Memphis, Kayla Grey of TSN reports.

name: Otto Porter Jr.
comment: The Raptors announced Tuesday that Porter underwent season-ending surgery on his left foot, Marc J. Spears of ESPN.com reports.

name: Simone Fontecchio
comment: Fontecchio didn't play in Wednesday's 131-128 win over the Raptors due to a sore left foot.

name: Anthony Gill
comment: Gill (COVID-19 protocols) is out for Wednesday's game versus the Pistons.
